name: Game Save Backup File
summary: Learn about .PAPA files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: To load a PAPA file, simply select "Load Backup!" from the "Choose A Slot" screen, choose Load..., navigate to your PAPA file, and click Open.
NOTE: If your browser deletes cookies then your PAPA file won't be saved.

description: File created by Flipline Studios games, which include Papa's Cupcakeria, Hot Doggeria, and Burgeria; file contains saved game progress data; data is automatically saved after each level on to the player's computer.
